input: What is the average transaction amount for bank account entries associated with the account contract UUID 01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef?

output.sql: SELECT AVG(Amount) FROM BankAccountEntries AS T1 JOIN BankAccountContract AS T2 ON T1.BankAccountUUID = T2.UUID WHERE T2.UUID = '01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef';
